name: entomological
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to insects and their scientific study: The museum has a spectacular collection of botanical and entomological specimens. I had seen drawings of these ants in entomological textbooks.
More examplesFewer examplesShe published a paper in the Journal of Entomological Research.The Entomological Society of America's annual conference featured three half-day symposiums on bedbugs.Mosquitoes are a small fraction of the large entomological collection at the Museum of World Insects.He loved to stroll along the beach and through the fields, in quest of shells or entomological specimens.Delicacies such as fried crickets and cockroach-studded pancakes may start a fashion for entomological food.
